Cyril, the butler, has loyally served the College for over thirty years and is still there today. Cyril advises freshmen in choosing the right wines; mixes the punch; prepares the ‘Loving Cup’ from an ancient and secret recipe; and recommends the Sherry. Here is ‘Cyril’s Own’
